# Math Streams

> Standard library math streams.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var streams = require( '@stdlib/streams/math' );
```

#### streams

Standard library math streams.

```javascript
var s = streams;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( streams ) );
```
